lines: 1. Ka manade ma Ruoth luongae,Kata loka nam malich,Kata ni mond` aidh loka got,Ayie dhiyo tiyone.Kata koluonga gi dwonde mosNi mond` achik yo makiya; Nawachi,"Ruodha, in Kibet koda,Ayie dhiyo ka manade."
Ayie dhiyo ka manade, Ruodha,Kadho got kata loka nam;Nawach gi midwaro mond` awachi;Ruoth, natim duto michiko.
2. Kata nitie weche magkonyruok monego awach tindeKata nitie ng`ato moketho,Monego anyise yo;Ruodha, In kibedo Jatenda,Ka yo bet malich nade,Nawach wechego ma ichikoa,Dwonda nolu weche magi.
3. Kata ka ok anyal tichmaduong` Kaka jomoko timo,Ang`eyo nitie tich moro,Ruoth, Ma anyalo tiyoni.Kamano aketora kuomi,Ang`eyo kihera ngang`;Natim tich duto minyisa.
